prompt:
Task: For each ingredient, choose the best Woolworths SKU (from candidates) and suggest how many retail packs are needed.
        Use servings + archetype context to keep quantities realistic. If no candidate fits, set selected_product_id to null and explain in package_notes.
        Do NOT rewrite the instructions or mention retailer names in the method; only provide product matches.

        Archetype snapshot:
        ```json
        {
  "uid": "arch_3f4k9z",
  "name": "Family Low-Carb Weeknight Basics",
  "core_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "LowCarb"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "ModernAmerican",
      "Mediterranean"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "EthicsReligious": [],
    "Allergens": []
  }
}
        ```

        Meal draft:
        ```json
        {
  "name": "Skillet Creamy Garlic Parmesan Chicken & Broccoli",
  "description": "Family-friendly low-carb chicken in a mild, creamy garlic-parmesan sauce with broccoli and cherry tomatoes. A quick stovetop skillet dinner with Mediterranean-leaning flavors.",
  "servings": "Serves 4",
  "prep_steps": [
    "Cut chicken breast into bite-size strips; pat dry.",
    "Cut broccoli into small florets; rinse and drain.",
    "Halve cherry tomatoes.",
    "Mince garlic.",
    "Zest then juice the lemon; keep separately.",
    "Measure chicken stock, cream, and grated parmesan cheese.",
    "Set out oregano, salt, and black pepper.",
    "Preheat a large skillet over medium-high heat with olive oil."
  ],
  "cook_steps": [
    "Season chicken strips with salt and black pepper; sear in hot olive oil 3–4 minutes until lightly browned and just cooked; transfer to a plate.",
    "Add broccoli to the skillet with a splash of chicken stock; cook 2–3 minutes, stirring, until bright and just tender-crisp.",
    "Reduce heat to medium; add garlic and cook 30 seconds until fragrant.",
    "Pour in remaining chicken stock and cream; stir in oregano and lemon zest; simmer 2–3 minutes to slightly thicken.",
    "Stir in parmesan cheese until melted and smooth; adjust sauce with a little water or stock if too thick.",
    "Add cherry tomatoes and return chicken (with juices) to the skillet; simmer 1–2 minutes to warm through.",
    "Finish with a squeeze of lemon juice; taste and adjust salt and black pepper.",
    "Serve hot, spooning extra sauce over the chicken and vegetables."
  ],
  "ingredients": [
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken breast",
      "quantity": "750 g",
      "preparation": "cut into bite-size strips"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "broccoli",
      "quantity": "500 g",
      "preparation": "cut into small florets"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cherry tomatoes",
      "quantity": "1 cup",
      "preparation": "halved"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "garlic",
      "quantity": "3 cloves",
      "preparation": "minced"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "olive oil",
      "quantity": "1.5 tablespoons"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "chicken stock",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "cream",
      "quantity": "1 cup"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "parmesan cheese",
      "quantity": "1/2 cup",
      "preparation": "grated"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "oregano",
      "quantity": "1 teaspoon",
      "preparation": "dried"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "lemon",
      "quantity": "1",
      "preparation": "zest and juice separated"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "salt",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    },
    {
      "core_item_name": "black pepper",
      "quantity": "to taste"
    }
  ],
  "meal_tags": {
    "Diet": [
      "LowCarb"
    ],
    "Cuisine": [
      "Mediterranean",
      "ModernAmerican"
    ],
    "PrepTime": [
      "15to30"
    ],
    "Complexity": [
      "Simple"
    ],
    "HeatSpice": [
      "Mild"
    ],
    "Allergens": [
      "Dairy"
    ],
    "BudgetLevel": [
      "Affordable"
    ],
    "Audience": [
      "Family"
    ],
    "CuisineOpenness": [
      "FamiliarClassics"
    ],
    "NutritionFocus": [
      "HighProtein"
    ]
  }
}
        ```
